channel.title: NFC on Dmytro's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in NFC on Dmytro's Blog

item.title: Scanning NFC tags using CoreNFC in an iOS app
item.description: Introduction I never had a chance to work with NFC (Near Field Communication), but I have always been curious to find out how it works. In this article, I will focus on scanning NFC tags using CoreNFC with NFCNDEFReaderSession. Preparation Before we begin, let’s add the necessary objects: Near Field Communication Tag Reading capability to the project. Privacy - NFC Scan Usage Description key to Info.plist. Near Field Communication Tag Reader Session Formats to the entitlements file.
